description.displayText: I want to say that Miss S was an excellent sitter. She committed to her job by doing what is required during her time. She is always on time and willing to work if any is needed. My both children love her passion for being who she was. I’m happy with her service that she gave us. By far, miss S was so one of the best sitters that I had. Thank you to Care.com and thank you for your service miss S. See you around.
